recipe_name: Toasted cashew and chilli broccoli salad with sesame soy dressing
author: Paul Rankin
method: Bring a saucepan of salted water to the boil. Add the broccoli and cook for 5-6 minutes, or until tender.  To serve, drain the broccoli and put it into a serving dish. Scatter the red chilli and cashew nuts over the broccoli, then dress it with the soy sauce and sesame oil.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz broccoli, cut into florets,  1 red chilli, finely chopped,  55g/2oz cashew nuts, toasted,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp sesame oil
